What are the five pillars of Islam?

The five pillars of Islam are: 1) Shahada (declaration of faith) - 'There is no god but Allah, and Muhammad is His messenger', 2) Salah (five daily prayers), 3) Zakat (obligatory charity), 4) Sawm (fasting during Ramadan), and 5) Hajj (pilgrimage to Mecca for those who are able).
